item.title: Brighter and Brighter until the Perfect Day
item.description:
Brighter and Brighter until the Perfect Day by Elder Mark A. Bragg, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 187th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 2017
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Mark A. Bragg, Of the Seventy

item.title: Christlike Poise
item.description:
